org.jenkinsci.plugins.darcs
Class DarcsScmDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  hudson.model.Descriptor<SCM>
      hudson.scm.SCMDescriptor<DarcsScm>
          org.jenkinsci.plugins.darcs.DarcsScmDescriptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Saveable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DarcsScm.DescriptorImpl
@Extension
public class DarcsScmDescriptor
extends SCMDescriptor<DarcsScm>

Inner class of the SCM descriptor. Contains the global configuration options as fields.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter
